domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @realDonaldTrump You’re joking, right? You could care less about the average person. This is all about re-election for you. I’m deeply saddened by your lack of empathy for your people. It took 6 months for you to address the severity of Covid-19 and even in your address, you didn’t sound sincere!
